video:video.video:title: Terrorist dressed as Santa Claus kills 35 New Year’s revelers at nightclub in Turkey 3244350
video:video.video:description: Russian media report that ISIS has claimed responsibility for the New Year’s Day massacre. 3244350

video:video.video:title: Worm found in Michigan woman’s McDonald’s fillet-o-fish sandwich 3245627
video:video.video:description: A Michigan woman picking apart her food discovered a worm weaved into the fish patty breading of her fillet-o-fish sandwich. 3245627

video:video.video:title: Titanic sank because of a huge and uncontrollable fire, expert claims 3245576
video:video.video:description: According to Irish journalist Senan Molony, 30-foot-long black marks on the hull of the Titanic before it left Belfast shipyard in 1912 are proof that a huge fire sunk the ship. 3245576

video:video.video:title: Horse gawks as python chows down on wallaby 3245568
video:video.video:description: The gnarly images show 7-meter python swallowing a wallaby in Queensland, Australia while a horse watches in curiousity. 3245568

video:video.video:title: Russia to build new futuristic nuclear-powered icebreaker to keep the Northern Sea Route open 3245504
video:video.video:description: Russia’s new nuclear-powered icebreaker, known as Leader, will exceed 200 meters in length and will be about 50 meters wide. 3245504

video:video.video:title: Satellites find molten iron liquid jet-stream at Earth’s core 3245440
video:video.video:description: Scientists working for the European Space Agency made the discovery using satellites that chart the Earth’s magnetic field. 3245440

video:video.video:title: Take a look inside Apple’s new $5 billion UFO headquarters 3245381
video:video.video:description: Some 13,000 employees will work at Apple’s new Campus 2 headquarters in Cupertino, California. 3245381

video:video.video:title: China aims to send probes to the moon, Jupiter and Mars 3245379
video:video.video:description: The Chinese government is aiming to land probes on the far-side of the moon and Mars by 2020. 3245379

video:video.video:title: UK blind patients to be fitted with bionic eye that can restore partial eyesight 3245328
video:video.video:description: The bionic eye is also known as Argus II, which was developed by American company Second Sight Medical Products. 3245328

video:video.video:title: Obama expels 35 suspected Russian spies and closes 2 compounds 3245316
video:video.video:description: The President says the moves are part of his administration’s response to Russia’s alleged hacking of the Democratic party and interference in the 2016 election. 3245316

video:video.video:title: Terrier rescued after hind leg gets stuck in airport escalator 3246509
video:video.video:description: Firefighters rescued a terrified terrier that got its left hind leg stuck in an escalator guard at the Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International airport. 3246509

video:video.video:title: Teen wins hearts all over the internet for feeding family of hungry raccoons 3246371
video:video.video:description: A lone raccoon started showing up at the young woman’s door in August of 2016, and soon the raccoon and four others were arriving at 7:30 on the dot, every night. 3246371

video:video.video:title: Indonesian pilot fired for attempting to fly commercial plane while drunk 3246314
video:video.video:description: On December 28, the tipsy pilot, Tekad Purna, successfully bypassed security checkpoints, stumbling through the metal detector and dropping personal items along the way. The pilot then entered the cockpit, and began making a largely incomprehensible pre-flight announcement that unnerved a number of the 154 passengers on board. 3246314

video:video.video:title: A giant Italian supervolcano is stirring beneath the Bay of Naples 3246249
video:video.video:description: The Campi Flegrei supervolcano lies beneath the Bay of Naples in southern Italy, an area home to more than half a million people. 3246249

video:video.video:title: Amazon plans to send airship warehouses into the sky as a launchpad for delivery drones 3246157
video:video.video:description: Amazon’s airborne fulfillment centers would hover at an altitude of 45,000 feet and be the focal point of a network of unmanned aerial vehicles, according to a patent filed in the United States. 3246157

video:video.video:title: Man attacks female Lyft driver because of how she parked her car 3245964
video:video.video:description: The driver was punched several times and had a tooth knocked out in the attack at a gas station in Santa Ana, California last Friday. 3245964

video:video.video:title: Smart bed designed to stop snoring and give you better quality sleep 3247207
video:video.video:description: Sleep Number has developed the 360 Smart Bed, which can continuously track the heart rate, movement and breathing of users. It also detects the sound of snoring, and adjusts to help the user stop. 3247207

video:video.video:title: People look on in shock as SUV rolls off barge and sinks into ocean 3247192
video:video.video:description: The car managed to stay afloat for around 30 seconds before it became a permanent submersible. 3247192

video:video.video:title: Gunman killed after ambushing cops in Arizona Walmart 3247118
video:video.video:description: The man shot one cop in the face and another in the chest. Little did he know, the second was wearing a ballistics vest. 3247118

video:video.video:title: Female shoppers squirted with semen by nasty pervert in Walmart 3247100
video:video.video:description: The sperm-squirting terrorist reportedly masturbated and loaded up his syringe in the Walmart parking lot and restroom on at least four separate occasions. He is suspected of spraying a dozen different women at the store. 3247100

video:video.video:title: Sickening torture of white special needs victim livestreamed on Facebook 3246950
video:video.video:description: Brittany Herring streamed a video to Facebook live on Tuesday showing her and three others brutally torturing a bound and gagged special needs man. 3246950

video:video.video:title: Loyal dog protects injured friend stuck on snowy train tracks for two days 3246912
video:video.video:description: The dogs were taken to a animal protection center, where they received medical attention. Thankfully, she reported only sustained bruises and hematomas. So it’s not clear why the dogs stayed on the tracks. 3246912
video:video.video:tag: loyal dog stays by fallen companion

video:video.video:title: Enough with the phony service pets on a plane already 3246643
video:video.video:description: While people with actual disabilities need service animals to fly, many people are now taking advantage of the rules so that their pets can fly for free. 3246643

video:video.video:title: Enough with the phony service pets on a plane already 3246640
video:video.video:description: While people with actual disabilities need service animals to fly, many people are now taking advantage of the rules so that their pets can fly for free. 3246640

video:video.video:title: Alcohol-sensing wristband lets you know how wasted you are 3248386
video:video.video:description: Milo Sensors has created a new alcohol-sensing wristband that can track your blood alcohol content and let you know how drunk or sober you are. 3248386
video:video.video:tag: how to tell if your drunk

video:video.video:title: High school principal admits he stole naked photos from students’ phones 3248251
video:video.video:description: Kentucky high school principal on child porn charges admits he stole naked photos from students' phones to exchange with others online. 3248251

video:video.video:title: South Korea creating Kim Jong Un ‘Decapitation Unit’ 3248180
video:video.video:description: The “unit” would be activated during an “event of war” between Seoul and Pyongyang. 3248180

south korea kill kim jong un

video:video.video:title: Nigeria finds Chibok girl kidnapped by Boko Haram wandering in the forest, with a baby in her arms 3248131
video:video.video:description: More than 100 girls remain missing, yet Nigeria’s defence department has declared that Boko Haram has been completely wiped out in the country. 3248131

video:video.video:title: Llama on the loose! Police respond to calls about llama running around town 3248096
video:video.video:description: On Jan. 4, police responded to calls from citizens of a camel in the streets, but they quickly found out the suspect in question was actually an escaped llama, who’d somehow broken out of its owner’s property and decided to trot along down a busy highway. 3248096

video:video.video:title: Woman’s SUV goes airborne, crashes into roof of North Carolina house 3248055
video:video.video:description: An elderly woman crashed her SUV into the roof of a house after passing out from a medical emergency. 3248055

video:video.video:title: Black teens charged with hate crime for live streaming torture of disabled white man 3247963
video:video.video:description: Four black teens have been charged with hate crimes for torturing a white special needs teen and broadcasting it live on Facebook on Tuesday. 3247963

video:video.video:title: Honda unveils self-balancing motorcycle to keep riders in the saddle 3247922
video:video.video:description: Honda’s Riding Assist concept motorcycle has an adjustable front fork that assumes a wider angle to increase stability and help riders maintain balance at tricky low speeds. 3247922

video:video.video:title: Congressman’s son drops a dab on House Speaker Paul Ryan 3247853
video:video.video:description: Cal Marshall caused a stir at his father Congressman Paul Marshall’s swearing-in photo call on Tuesday, when he taught House Speaker Paul Ryan how to dab. 3247853

video:video.video:title: What the hell!? Ominous demon photo goes viral on Facebook 3247809
video:video.video:description: The post was shared 80,000 times before it was taken down on Wednesday. However, many people are skeptical about the photo, suggesting the dark shape looming over the sidewalk is likely just a tree or a Photoshop job. 3247809

video:video.video:title: Video shows ferocious rabid bobcat attacks wildlife officer in Floridian home 3248825
video:video.video:description: Wildlife officers were called in after the bobcat attacked the family dog and then ran into the house. 3248825

video:video.video:title: Fort Lauderdale airport shooting kills at least five people 3248816
video:video.video:description: The suspect, Esteban Santiago opened fire randomly at people in the baggage claim area, until he ran out of bullets. 3248816

video:video.video:title: China is giving its propaganda a facelift to reach out to Chinese millennials 3248559
video:video.video:description: As China’s millennials becoming increasingly connected to the outside world, the CCP has had to upgrade its propaganda game. 3248559
